mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.confirm_flow_id, t.business_id, t.confirm_user, u4.user_name AS confirmUserName, t.function_id, t.submit_user, u2.user_name AS submitUserName, t.submit_time, t.approve_user, u3.user_name AS approveUserName, t.approve_time, t.approve_opinion FROM confirm_operation_queue t LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.user_login = t.submit_user LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.user_login = t.approve_user LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.user_login = t.confirm_user where t.id = #{id}
